entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
